name: rube-cc-skills
description: A curated collection of Claude Code plugins

plugins.name: council
plugins.description: AI Council - Orchestrate multiple AI consultants (Gemini, Codex, Qwen, GLM-4.7, Kimi K2.5) for consensus-driven code reviews, plan validation, and architectural decisions

plugins.name: cdt
plugins.description: Multi-agent development workflow with four modes: plan, dev, full, and auto. Uses Agent Teams for collaborative roles (Architect, PM, Developer, Tester, Reviewer) and a Researcher subagent for documentation lookups via Context7.

plugins.name: project-manager
plugins.description: GitHub issue lifecycle: create structured issues for LLM agent teams, triage and recommend next issues, audit and clean up stale backlogs

plugins.name: plugin-dev
plugins.description: Plugin development tools: scaffold new plugins, validate SKILL.md frontmatter, audit hooks for silent failures

plugins.name: temporal
plugins.description: Temporal durable execution platform: CLI commands, SDK patterns (Go, TypeScript, Python, Java), workflow orchestration, and architectural guidance for reliable distributed applications

plugins.name: doppler
plugins.description: Doppler secrets management: CLI operations, project/config/environment management, secrets injection, CI/CD integrations, and security best practices

plugins.name: oasis-dev
plugins.description: Oasis Network development: Sapphire confidential EVM, ROFL off-chain apps, CLI operations, SDK patterns (Rust, Go, TypeScript, Python), and ParaTime development

plugins.name: jules-review
plugins.description: Review Jules AI agent pull requests using council review with smart quick/full mode selection and GitHub PR review posting

plugins.name: dlc
plugins.description: Dev Life Cycle quality gates: security scans, code quality, performance analysis, test coverage, and PR review compliance with automated GitHub issue creation
